name: dtuevent
description: This website will be a central registry for Technical University of Denmark (DTU)'s campus events from bars and cafes. JS/Node.js/REACT/Tailwind frontend, Supabase backend for hosting and DB. The site pulls through facebook's API from a number of DTU Campus bars and nearby form bars. Can be filtered by Lyngby Campus, Ballerup Campus and Dorms.

scripts.test: npm run test:deno && npm run test:api
scripts.build: npm --prefix ./packages/shared run build && npm --prefix ./web run build
